amendment.description: An amendment numbered 139 printed in House Report 115-297 to require the Bureau of Labor Statistics to submit an estimate of the resources needed to model for various changes in the workforce composition because of technological displacement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A129) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A129) offered by Mr. Foster.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A129) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
